mapper.sql: select emp_id, emp_code, CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) as emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_age, birth_date, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_dept_id, emp_dept_name, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact, emp_emergency_contact_phone, emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, disabled, emp_status_update_time, invisible, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, salary_level_min, salary_level_max from employee
mapper.select:
select emp_id, emp_code, CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) as emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_age, birth_date, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_dept_id, department.dept_name as emp_dept_name, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact, emp_emergency_contact_phone, emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, employee.disabled, emp_status_update_time, invisible, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, salary_level_min, salary_level_max from employee left join department on employee.emp_dept_id = department.dept_id and department.disabled = 0 where employee.disabled = 0
and DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{empExport.date} , '%Y-%m')
and emp_id in
#{empId}
where emp_id = #{empId} and disabled = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into employee
emp_code, emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_age, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_dept_id, emp_dept_name, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact,
emp_emergency_contact_phone,
emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, disabled, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, birth_date, salary_level_min, salary_level_max,
#{empCode}, SP_ENCRYPT(#{empIdcard}), #{empName}, #{empAge}, #{empStatus}, #{empPoliticalStatus}, #{empGender}, #{empEducation}, #{empSpeciality}, #{empTitle}, #{empCategory}, #{empType}, #{empDeptId}, #{empDeptName}, #{empEmployingUnits}, #{empHrCompany}, #{empPositionLevel}, #{empPosition}, #{empHiredate}, #{empSalaryLevel}, #{empRemark}, #{empEmergencyContact},
#{empEmergencyContactPhone},

mapper.update:
update employee
emp_code = #{empCode}, emp_idcard = SP_ENCRYPT(#{empIdcard}), emp_name = #{empName}, emp_age = #{empAge}, emp_status = #{empStatus}, emp_political_status = #{empPoliticalStatus},
emp_gender = #{empGender}, emp_education = #{empEducation}, emp_speciality = #{empSpeciality}, emp_title = #{empTitle}, emp_category = #{empCategory}, emp_type = #{empType}, emp_dept_id = #{empDeptId}, emp_dept_name = #{empDeptName}, emp_employing_units = #{empEmployingUnits},
emp_hr_company = #{empHrCompany}, emp_position_level = #{empPositionLevel},
emp_position = #{empPosition}, emp_hiredate = #{empHiredate}, emp_salary_level = #{empSalaryLevel}, emp_remark = #{empRemark}, emp_emergency_contact = #{empEmergencyContact},
emp_emergency_contact_phone = #{empEmergencyContactPhone},
emp_telephone = #{empTelephone}, emp_home_address = #{empHomeAddress}, emp_reference = #{empReference}, emp_change_type = #{empChangeType}, emp_update_time = #{empUpdateTime}, emp_update_by = #{empUpdateBy}, emp_expire_time = #{empExpireTime}, emp_avatar_url = #{empAvatarUrl}, emp_status_update_time = #{empStatusUpdateTime}, nation = #{nation}, retire_reminder = #{retireReminder}, hire_limit_date = #{hireLimitDate}, dept_info_two = #{deptInfoTwo}, dept_info_three = #{deptInfoThree}, emp_position_category = #{empPositionCategory},
native_place = #{nativePlace}, birth_place = #{birthPlace}, domicile_place = #{domicilePlace}, school = #{school}, highest_education = #{highestEducation}, graduate_time = #{graduateTime}, acquire_time = #{acquireTime}, attend_time = #{attendTime}, refuse_month = #{refuseMonth}, accumulative_month = #{accumulativeMonth}, contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime}, contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime}, work_phone = #{workPhone}, on_job_time = #{onJobTime}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, salary_level_min = #{salaryLevelMin}, salary_level_max = #{salaryLevelMax},
where emp_id = #{empId} and disabled = 0

update employee
emp_code = #{empCode}, emp_idcard = SP_ENCRYPT(#{empIdcard}), emp_name = #{empName}, emp_age = #{empAge}, emp_status = #{empStatus}, emp_political_status = #{empPoliticalStatus},
emp_gender = #{empGender}, emp_education = #{empEducation}, emp_speciality = #{empSpeciality}, emp_title = #{empTitle}, emp_category = #{empCategory}, emp_type = #{empType}, emp_dept_id = #{empDeptId}, emp_dept_name = #{empDeptName}, emp_employing_units = #{empEmployingUnits},
emp_hr_company = #{empHrCompany}, emp_position_level = #{empPositionLevel},

native_place = #{nativePlace}, birth_place = #{birthPlace}, domicile_place = #{domicilePlace}, school = #{school}, highest_education = #{highestEducation}, graduate_time = #{graduateTime}, acquire_time = #{acquireTime}, attend_time = #{attendTime}, refuse_month = #{refuseMonth}, accumulative_month = #{accumulativeMonth}, contract_start_time = #{contractStartTime}, contract_end_time = #{contractEndTime}, work_phone = #{workPhone}, on_job_time = #{onJobTime}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, salary_level_min = #{salaryLevelMin}, salary_level_max = #{salaryLevelMax}, disabled = 0
where emp_id = #{empId}
update employee set disabled = 1 where emp_id = #{empId} and disabled = 0
mapper.select:
select emp_id, CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) as emp_idcard, emp_name from employee
and emp_status in
#{listItem}
and disabled = 0
where CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) = #{empIdCard} and disabled = 0
where CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) = #{empIdCard}

select emp_id, emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_dept_id, department.dept_name as emp_dept_name, emp_position from employee left join department on employee.emp_dept_id = department.dept_id where emp_name = #{empName} and employee.disabled = 0 limit 1

select emp_id, emp_code, emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_age, birth_date, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_dept_id, emp_dept_name, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact, emp_emergency_contact_phone, emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, disabled, emp_status_update_time, invisible, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, salary_level_min, salary_level_max from employee where disabled = 0

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = #{empStatus} and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_hiredate, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 2 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_hiredate, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 3 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 4 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 5 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 6 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))

select count(emp_id) from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_status = 7 and (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m'))
where disabled = 0

select emp_id, CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) as emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_dept_id from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_name in
#{empName}

select emp_name from employee where disabled = 0 and emp_name in
#{empName}

where emp_id in
#{empId}
where (DATE_FORMAT(emp_create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{currentTime} or DATE_FORMAT(emp_status_update_time, '%Y-%m') = #{currentTime}) and disabled = 0

where disabled = 0 and emp_dept_id in
#{deptId}

select emp_id, emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_dept_id, department.dept_name as emp_dept_name, emp_code, emp_age, birth_date, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact, emp_emergency_contact_phone, emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, employee.disabled, emp_status_update_time, invisible, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, salary_level_min, salary_level_max from employee left join department on employee.emp_dept_id = department.dept_id where emp_name = #{empName} and employee.disabled = 0 limit 1

select emp_id, emp_idcard, emp_name, emp_dept_id, department.dept_name as emp_dept_name, emp_code, emp_age, birth_date, emp_status, emp_political_status, emp_gender, emp_education, emp_speciality, emp_title, emp_category, emp_type, emp_employing_units, emp_hr_company, emp_position_level, emp_position, emp_hiredate, emp_salary_level, emp_remark, emp_emergency_contact, emp_emergency_contact_phone, emp_telephone, emp_home_address, emp_reference, emp_change_type, emp_update_time, emp_update_by, emp_create_time, emp_create_by, emp_avatar_url, emp_expire_time, employee.disabled, emp_status_update_time, invisible, nation, retire_reminder, hire_limit_date, dept_info_two, dept_info_three, emp_position_category, native_place, birth_place, domicile_place, school, highest_education, graduate_time, acquire_time, attend_time, refuse_month, accumulative_month, contract_start_time, contract_end_time, work_phone, on_job_time, salary_level_min, salary_level_max from employee left join department on employee.emp_dept_id = department.dept_id where emp_name = #{empName} and employee.disabled = 1 limit 1

select emp_id, emp_name, CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) as emp_idcard, emp_dept_id, emp_dept_name from employee where disabled = 0
and (emp_name like concat ('%', #{empInfo.keyword}, '%') or CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) like concat ('%', #{empInfo.keyword}, '%'))
and emp_dept_id in
#{item}
where emp_name like concat('%', #{empIdCard}, '%') or CAST(SP_DECRYPT(emp_idcard) AS CHAR(128)) like concat('%', #{empIdCard}, '%')
where emp_dept_id = #{deptId} and year(emp_create_time) = #{valueYear} and disabled = 0 and emp_status in (1,2,5,7)
select emp_id, emp_idcard, emp_name from employee where disabled = 1 and emp_name =#{empName} ORDER BY emp_update_time desc
